allowArgumentsExplicitlyTypedAsAny.description: Whether to ignore arguments that are explicitly typed as `any`.

allowDirectConstAssertionInArrowFunction.description:
Whether to ignore return type annotations on body-less arrow functions that return an `as const` type assertion.
You must still type the parameters of the function.

allowedNames.description: An array of function/method names that will not have their arguments or return values checked.

allowHigherOrderFunctions.description:
Whether to ignore return type annotations on functions immediately returning another function expression.
You must still type the parameters of the function.

allowOverloadFunctions.description: Whether to ignore return type annotations on functions with overload signatures.

allowTypedFunctionExpressions.description: Whether to ignore type annotations on the variable of a function expression.
